hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated:"The Messenger of Allah traveled on a journey and he prayed two Rak'ah for nineteen days." Ibn Abbas said: "So when we would stay somewhere for nineteen (days) we would pray two Rak'ah , and if we stayed longer than that we would complete the Salat

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَمْ تُقْصَرُ الصَّلاَةُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About How Long The Prayer Is Shortened
